Data.Title: Days of the week
Data.Description: A day of the week is form by => Kanji word + 曜日 (ようび - Yōbi)

Sentence: 月曜日　= Monday, Day of Moon (Getsuyōbi)
火曜日　= Tuesday, Day of fire (Kayōbi)
水曜日　= Wednesday, Day of the water (Suiyōbi)
木曜日　= Thursday, Day of tree (Mokuyōbi)
金曜日　= Friday, Day of metal (Kinyōbi)
土曜日　= Saturday, Day of Land (Doyōbi)
日曜日　= Sunday, Day of sun (Nichiyōbi)
Kanjis: - 月 = Moon (つき- Tsuki)|- 曜日 = Day of Week (ようび - Yōbi)
- 火 = Fire (か - Ka)|- 曜日 = Day of Week (ようび - Yōbi)
- 水 = Water (みず- Mizu)|- 曜日 = Day of Week (ようび - Yōbi)
- 木 = Tree (き - Ki)|- 曜日 = Day of Week (ようび - Yōbi)
- 金 = Metal (きん- Kin)|- 曜日 = Day of Week (ようび - Yōbi)
- 土 = Land (つち- Tsuchi)|- 曜日 = Day of Week (ようび - Yōbi)
- 日 = Sun (にち- Nichi)|- 曜日 = Day of Week (ようび - Yōbi)
